items: Company Annual Account and Ellipro Survey
comments: Address proof available through utility bill issued by London City Utilities.
Annual accounts for 2020, 2021, and 2022 provided with Ellipro scores of 80, 83, and 85 respectively.
Bank account details and postal code available.
Director verification statuses are either pending or under review.
Tax documents include annual tax return, VAT registration, and tax clearance, some pending reviews.
Environmental and industry license compliance statuses are under review.
Business scope verification status is updated to include various lines of business such as CCB and CIB.
No PEP screening data found for the LEI ID.
Revenue details for 2023, 2022, and 2021 included, along with managed revenue for 2023.
Market capitalization was 489,320 million dollars as of December 31, 2023.
